g.text: The above rect should be BLACK.
SVG 1.1 FULL says there should be a "highly perceivable error" message when an invalid fill url is used.
Browsers don't display such an error, instead use some sort of fill-fallback.
If there's an invalid fill URI, but no fallback specified, it is as if fill="black" was specified.
This has recently been changed in SVG 1.1 2nd edition. Our result matches Opera now.
